transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ah, namaskar ma'am, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke head office se Pradeep ji se baat ho sakti hai?
Customer: Haan ho sakte hain.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir namaskar Aditya baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART ke head office se. Sir aapki subah ek inquiry aayi thi sir ki aapko sir buyleads nahi dikh rahe the sir. To woh problem aapka resolve ho gaya sir? Hamare executive se shayad aapki baat hui thi sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi woh buyleads sham ko to consume hua hai, mane dikha hi nahi woh expiry bol ke dikha raha tha humko woh click hua nahi.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Matlab aapne jab open kiya to woh on the spot hi aisa ho gaya? On the spot 3 minute ke andar humne jaise hi hamare paas notification aata hai na, notification ko on karke jaise hi dekhne gaya to usko click karne ja raha tha woh dikha raha mane itna jaldi to koi hota nahi aur hoga bhi to koi aapke paas jitne vendor hai jo bhi hum hamare jaise hai woh sabke paas to jayega hi.
Executive: Ji sir ji.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir agar aisa hai na dekhiye main to jo mera ek woh personal cheez hai ki aap to dekho sir highly active apne client ho. Theek hai sir? Main dekha hu maine aapka profile bhi pura study kiya hai to aap jo hai ki jo jaldi jaldi buyleads aati hai aap usi ko consume karte ho. Yeh first time aapke saath hua tha sir? Jo aap abhi bol rahe ho yeh aapke saath first time hua na yeh? Achha achha ji okay. First time hua haan ji. Haan to aisa kabhi kabhi kya hota hai na sir kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ek hi time pe bahut zyada log active ho rehte hai to woh consume ho jaata hai. Ab aapki baat main bilkul samajh raha hu ki matlab yeh kabhi nahi hua tha. Ek second aap hold rakhenge?
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye.
Customer: Ek second aap thoda sa hold rakhe main dusra phone.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul ji.
Customer: Chala unhone se bahar roki chiye janna padh raha.
Customer: Aise jeti ye hochi.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Sir main keh raha tha na ki dekho yeh kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki aapke usi time pe ho sakta hai kai log zyada active ho. Kya hai na jaise hum log kya hai ki aap apna IndiaMART bhi sambhalte ho aur saath saath mein apna business bhi sambhalte ho. Barobar sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan to kya hota hai kabhi kabhi kuch kuch aur log hote hai woh kya karte hai IndiaMART pe ek banda hi baitha rehta hai sirf ki woh lead consume kare. To ho sakta hai uss time pe woh lead koi consume kar le gaya ho ki kya hai na ki ek buylead jo hota hai sirf paanch log consume kar sakte hai aisa rehta hai. Theek hai? To ek aad buylead mein agar first time aapne aisa experience feel face kiya hai to main uske liye bata raha hu ki aisa hota hai sir. Ek buylead kya hota hai paanch log consume kar lete hai to woh hat jaata hai. Yeh aapke saath first time hua hai aage aisa na ho aisa nahi hoga sir matlab aise competition ke basis pe hota hai sir. Ki matlab hum agar dhyan nahi dete na to dekhiye sir aap itne time se use kar rahe ho kabhi aapke paas aisa nahi hua first time aisa hua is wajah se aapne query raise ki. Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says buyleads were consumed quickly.

- Customer says buyleads showed as expired.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the competition for buyleads.

- Executive said one buylead can be consumed by five people.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, competition, consume
